website_summaries.verdict: This affordable product has been known to produce noticeable results, including glowing skin, but may not be ideal for those with sensitive skin.
pros: Formulated with natural oils and collagen to moisturize and exfoliate the skin
Has a light scent that most users found pleasant
cons: Consistency is thinner than expected, and doesn't dry when applied
Caused breakouts for a few users

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! Packaging is great, product works really well. The mask itself felt really nice and cooling, almost a little tingly, on my skin. With almost every face mask I've ever tried, my skin's redness is never calmed and that's the main issue for my skin in particular. However, when I removed this mask, the redness was instantly calmed, which was super impressive and really surprising. My skin wasn't really left the softest, though. I applied a moisturizer afterwards so that my skin would feel nice and smooth. I would definitely recommend this mask to people with red problem areas, inflammation of the skin, and those with large pores!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Thin Consistency!! Not worth
customer_reviews.text: very thin consistency.. it was well packed but bottle was half full when i opened it:( .. tried it, but not very happy with results...scent is good but not worth the money.. not what i was looking for.. wish i could return it 😒😒
customer_reviews.author: Gauri

customer_reviews.title: pretty but eh
customer_reviews.text: its a good price for a face mask that has gold in it but i don't think it was very effective. it was hard to smooth over and it didn't wash off well, even under direct shower water. i didn't feel like it revitalized my face and that it was mostly for looks. it does have lots of gold sparkle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cozette Z

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff  Works !!
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptical about this. But, since the 1st time I used it...I'm In Love with it ! Don't wait ! I wish I hadn't. Turning 50 this year and my skin had a complete WOW factor after just using it for the first time. Definitely will buy again !
customer_reviews.author: jacqui schiermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Trust issues
customer_reviews.text: I probably wouldn’t recommend this. I had it for a few months without opening it and it seemed that the gold split away from the water part of this, it almost looked like when you combine oil and water. I didn’t end up testing it on my face because honestly, I did not trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mask several times & haven’t noticed a single thing different with my skin. Maybe you have to use consistently over time? I wouldn’t say it’s bad for my skin, bit haven’t noticed any differences either.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Made my face break out
customer_reviews.text: Made my face break out -- took 2 weeks fro it to heal & get back to normal :(
customer_reviews.author: jfree99

customer_reviews.title: facial mask wrinkle treatment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to gift my girl and I think she like it. this product makes with best formula ingredient. my girl used it and look happy with product. she feel difference after used it. she always have problem with wrinkle and always complain about it. but now she is quite happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jayanti & Roshan

customer_reviews.title: Angel like feels , works magic
customer_reviews.text: The gold face mask is so fascinating. It looks so good on the face when applied. It gives a wet gold foil look like Cleopatra. Loved it. Also, once cleaned, the face definitely glows and I noticed my skin looked lot brighter the next day. I totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: perksofbeautyblog

customer_reviews.title: It’s good product.
customer_reviews.text: I tried once and found it working well so far. I placed some on my face and waited about 20 minutes to wash it off. While washing its sticky on my face first, then after washing it, it’s getting smooth and moisture on my face. I went ahead and applied some lotion before going to bed. It’s good product. :-)
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. My skin is very strong and barely get any rash from any products. This item gave me pain sensation when I applied this on my face, I washed my face right away but still gave me me rush all over my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was a little weirded out. As someone who's used to a more natural clay texture, this mask goes on much smoother. Once it was on though, it felt so luxurious. It's easy to get full coverage, and my skin feels great after!
customer_reviews.author: MadreDeGatos

customer_reviews.title: My face loves it
customer_reviews.text: This mask came recommended to me and my face just loves it. Brightens my complexion and smooths the surface. Very hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i love this item and my skin is so smooth and less wrinkles every time i use this as i use this twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: racquel

customer_reviews.title: Hey Gold Member
customer_reviews.text: Smells terrible... Haven't seen any results, but hey I have only tried it a few times... I do think it is nice to have a gold face....
customer_reviews.author: ElectricZepp

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Omg it’s horrible!!!it makes my face breaks up so bad

customer_reviews.title: Love this and love the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this and love the price, I had gotten 24k gold eye patches and saw this complete face mask and had to have it, feels great going on and coming off, my skin is glowing
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask!! My husband bought it for me as a gift and it's amazing! My skin feels very moisturized, I love the way it goes on, will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This mask irritated my skin, caused redness and breakouts worse than what I already had. I would not recommend this mask for anyone with sensitive skin or skin prone to breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not thick like advertised. No visible change. Don’t waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Myers

customer_reviews.title: Works for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Definitely gives your skin a gorgeous glow. I used it on myself (mid 30's) and my mom (early 70's). It gave both of us the most beautiful glow. Mind you we've gone to spas and recieved facials (thank you groupon) but nothing like this glow.
customer_reviews.author: lasincera82

customer_reviews.title: this smells wonderful, makes my skin feel very soft
customer_reviews.text: this smells wonderful, makes my skin feel very soft. Don't know if it a cure for wrinkles or if there is one but well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Betti Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I broke out terribly with this product. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Vishal

customer_reviews.title: Great skin suppleness and radiance
customer_reviews.text: Results as stated. Great skin suppleness and radiance. I ll use it also in neck/décolleté.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product you can see changes right away after ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product you can see changes right away after applying but you have to continue applying..

customer_reviews.title: Chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: Product is very bad. Do not apply on your face. It given you chemical burn and make whole face red for all day

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It really only made me tan tbh. Super messy, too

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you feeling refreshed
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice tingle and smells pretty good, my wife loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is incredible, work wonderfully on face. Definitely I will buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: and my face feels AMAZING! The next morning after testing product
customer_reviews.text: I've used once so far, and my face feels AMAZING! The next morning after testing product, I noticed my skin is softer and has a glow. Looking forward to continuing use!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Molly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is thinner than i expected and dont really make my face feel hydrated but ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mask. It makes my skin so soft .
customer_reviews.author: Yuhong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the cooling sensation it has. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Annual fun for the husband and I.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have an annual face mask date. This year I wanted to go for a mask to help his age lines.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cullinane

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special.... Im sorry to leave a bad review
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a miracle.... But this product didn't make my skin feel any different. Not refreshing not smoothing. I had to have it though. I was very curious.
customer_reviews.author: amanda ann nowlin

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: left my face red and irritated. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yettymonkey

customer_reviews.title: Its nice i really liked it....
customer_reviews.text: I liked this 24k gold mask, it works very well the only thing that i was concerned about and I'm sure it's nothing to be alerted over maybe its the way it suppose to work but during the time of having the mask on i felt a burning sensation on my face, and after before it came time to wash it off it started tingling and it was hard to wash off using water alone but after my skin felt so smooth and glowing 💁 I'd buy this agian, no rash,or burns after just beautiful skin.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Green

customer_reviews.title: I think it's working
customer_reviews.text: Used just once. Some parts of my face is still little bit reddened (affected parts where I have some scars), but soft. But the other parts are really glowing and very soft. I'll use this twice an week and update this review after few weeks with more details. But I think I like this mask and this is pretty much what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessFiona99

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to open and had a little scooper to get ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is definitely gold! It was easy to open and had a little scooper to get the mask out of the tub. It goes on smoothly and dried in about 20 minutes. It took a little while to get it off with warm water, but my skin was soft afterward. I will look to use it a few times a week to see if I continue to get revitalized and moisturized results.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The product smells very pleasant. The mask doesn't dry ...
customer_reviews.text: The product smells very pleasant. The mask doesn't dry though which is odd. Only used once and can't speak to any anti aging results just yet. My skin felt soft and moisturized afterward.
customer_reviews.author: David bahia

customer_reviews.title: it does look pretty when it’s on your face & even in the ...
customer_reviews.text: it’s a gold face mask. it does look pretty when it’s on your face & even in the jar, which is plastic, but i haven’t seen any positive results after 3 months is consistent use
customer_reviews.author: Dozier Family

customer_reviews.title: it made my face swell up like a lobster
customer_reviews.text: If you have sensitive skin, I hope this product works for you. For me, within 8 hours of using it, it made my face swell up like a lobster, pussing, oozing, crusting, and my face didn't go back to normal until a week later. I looked like a burn victim for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! OMG! My face feels soooooo good after using this, but I did want to walk around talking like C3PO for a while as I wore it...LOL! It felt so good while it was on. It was cool and refreshing and my skin was so soft and radiant when I rinsed it off. I can't wait to find a natural scrub to use to enhance the effects of it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Fringer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality  24k gold mask
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried other similar 24k masks and this one is by far superior to the other brands I’ve tried. It even have speckles of nano gold in it. It plumps up your face making it feel taut. It’s also smoothing of fine lines and wrinkles and makes my skin glow and quite hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Super poor quality, it irritated my skin so bad and gave me the worst acne reaction. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: No difference after use.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t tell a bit of difference in my skin. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time. Buy the real deal for $$ but don’t waste money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do anything. Feels like gooey lotion but has none of the benefits. “24k Gold Mask” is very deceiving because it probably just has harmful products to make it look good. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on an $8 Amazon deal. I have been using this since I got it and I love the way it feels on my skin. It does not dry on the skin and when I wash it off, my skin feels very soft. It's not the easiest to wash off, so I used a silicone scrubber to help out. We shall see what happens in the next week or two if there are any drastic changes with my acne scars and discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: Aja

customer_reviews.title: Not good spa mask
customer_reviews.text: Crap product. Smelled like playdough. Felt nasty on face. Zero benefits to this mask. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Good Face mask but be careful how much you put on its hard to get off. I ordered a brush as well and I defiantly recommend getting one with the mask it makes putting it on a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My mother loved this product, it's worth the price. 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Great smell, left my skin glowing and is by far the best thing I’ve ever used for blackheads, completely gone after one use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your own personal spa
customer_reviews.text: This face mask made my skin so soft. It was super fun to use, wasn’t uncomfortable at all or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do anything. Buy Aztec healing clay mask instead
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do anything. Threw it away after I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Micala King

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot in container but your not supposed to use it every day so it's not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best face Mask ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best mask I have ever used. Especially after washing your face with 'Majestic 24K body and face scrub" After you apply this with your 'Facial Mask Brush' ....... go about whatever you have to do. Then clean it off with warm water. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: PamiB

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I order this in Jan 2018 and it didn't come until April 2018 That is crazy! Theb product it self was not what I exspected. Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nolen

customer_reviews.title: ... ONE FOR A GIFT AND FOR MYSELF I REALLY LIKE IT A LOT
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR ME AND ALSO ONE FOR A GIFT AND FOR MYSELF I REALLY LIKE IT A LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the gold.
customer_reviews.text: This left my face feeling very nice, soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: ArindaStormWeaver

customer_reviews.title: One of the best masks I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a mask that moisturizes my face SO WELL. You really can beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: This mask is one of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of my favorite face masks I own. After reading the reviews, I was a bit skeptical of the mask. I do not notice many of things on my skin that people seemed to have noticed in some reviews (i.e., burning.) I have face masks that burn a little, and this one does not. I feel like my skin feels much better after using it too. The only problem I have with this mask is that I feel like it will get used up a lot quicker than some of the other masks I have because it is a bit on the thinner side. Love this mask, though!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for my skin
customer_reviews.text: This mask happened to be perfect for my skin : tighten pores , glow , and improvement in complexion in general !
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: Fun and effective gold mask!
customer_reviews.text: Fun and effective gold mask! This is a fun experience, luxurious-feeling mask to use because of the gold shimmer. I’ve tried a lot of products and this one did exactly what I was looking for. Immediate results.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lin

customer_reviews.title: Rash after using
customer_reviews.text: I liked the mask a lot while using it, but I have giant blister like rashes all over my face. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Lalalauren
